testcase.name: Search a Product MacBook Air
testcase.system-out: Given I have a search field on Amazon Page..................................passed When I search for a product with name "Apple MacBook Air" and price 200.....passed Then Product with name "Apple MacBook Air" should be displayed..............passed And Order id is 12345 and username is "Naveen"..............................passed
